plugin.name: Aard_Reconnect
plugin.purpose: Reconnects if no ticks seen in 120 seconds
plugin.description: Pmage made into plugin - - Fiendish and unnamed others code Plugin - disconnect and Reconnects if no ticks seen in 120 seconds - thanks Fiendish and co

muclient.script:
-- ***** prints plugin info on install function OnPluginInstall() print("Plugin Initialized: " .. GetPluginName() .. " ".. GetPluginID()) print("******** Plugin reconnects performs a disconnect and reconnect if no tick seen in 120 seconds ********") print("") end --endfunc onplugininstall
--- ***** Reconnects if disconnected (after not seeing a tick)
-- Variables to store the time of the last tick and the elapsed tiem local last_tick = os.time() local elapsed_time = 0
-- Function for GMCP broadcast function OnPluginBroadcast(msg, id, name, text) -- check if the message is a tick and the id matches the GMCP handler plugin if text == "comm.tick" and id == "3e7dedbe37e44942dd46d264" then -- Update the time of the last tick last_tick = os.time() end --if end --func
-- function to check the elapsed time function OnPluginTick() -- calculate the elapsed time since the last tick elapsed_time = os.time() - last_tick
-- check if the elapsed time is greater than 120 seconds if elapsed_time > 120 then -- reconnect to the game Reconnect()
-- reset the elapsed time and the last tick time elapsed_time = 0 last_tick = os.time() end -- if end -- func
